page.title: 11The Chequers (public house)
page.content: The Chequers is a public house.It is on the corner of Toad Lane.A public house is like a shop but you have to eat or drink on the premises.The pub sells soft drinks and alcoholic drinks.They also sell food.The older people come for company and a good laugh.So do separated people.Most of the people are over 40 but some are younger people .There are 2 bowls teams and 1 darts team.There are also 2 domino teams.The busiest day is Friday or sometimes Saturday.You are not allowed at the bar until you are 18 and you can't serve at the bar as well,even for nothing.The pub opens between 12.00 and 14.00 and at night between 19.00 and 22.30.
